title: Almost Done Preparing!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Hey, is this how we should throw the surprise party?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>From what I’ve read on the internet, this is supposed to be how they do it overseas.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hmm, not everyone overseas goes that far with their surprises. But, we did come up with a surprise that we’ve never thought of before, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I agree, definitely.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I hope Mia-chan will be astonished!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Let’s put on the finishing touches and finish strong!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Ah, why don’t we have some tea afterwards? I’m tired.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan wants to take a nap for juuuust a bit~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hey, you two! I guess it can be helped. I’ll go prepare some black tea and meringue cookies. Kanata-chan, I’ll get you the perfect blanket for your nap. What a perfect combination~ It’ll be splendid~ ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Emma-chan, I love you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
